channel.title: Microsoft Cloud on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Cloud on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: This Microsoft Entra ID Vulnerability Could Have Caused a Digital Catastrophe
item.description: A pair of flaws in Microsoft’s Entra ID identity and access management system could have allowed an attacker to gain access to virtually all Azure customer accounts.

item.title: This Microsoft Entra ID Vulnerability Could Have Caused a Digital Catastrophe
item.description: A pair of flaws in Microsoft’s Entra ID identity and access management system could have allowed an attacker to gain access to virtually all Azure customer accounts.
